name: SNOW Beta
description:
Join the PlayStation®4 SNOW Beta and be the first to experience the mountain on snowboard, skis, and snowmobile!

Explore a massive mountain, customize your character with clothing and equipment from the biggest brands, and compete in events to be the best. The SNOW Beta will be available until this winter when SNOW will become free-to-play.

By joining the SNOW Beta, you will receive this Founder’s Pack:

- Snowboard outfit (including helmet, goggles, mask, jacket, pants, gloves, boots, bindings and snowboard)
- Ski outfit (including hat, sunglasses, mask, jacket, pants, gloves, boots, poles, bindings and skis)
- Snowmobile unlock
- Exclusive gold snowmobile
- Exclusive gold drone

Use of PSN and SEN account are subject to the Terms of Service and User Agreement and applicable privacy policy (see terms at sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service & sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
Online features may be terminated at any time.
*Online multiplayer requires a PlayStation®Plus membership.

1 player
Network Players 2-12
4GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Online Play (Optional)
